name: Easy-Breezy Wilderness
description: A semi-open shop outfitted with a custom canopy and unique water feature, found within the "Easybreeze Market."\nIts most notable innovation is the outer wall, painted with a unique phlogiston pigment developed by an Asha designer. This pigment enhances the aroma of the caf√©'s brews with a subtle essence reminiscent of the Tenochtzitoc prairie. Thanks to its success, many other shops in "Easybreeze Market" have followed suit, embracing this artistic touch.
